23277494:
~The Aurora Retreat~
Beautiful new home! Free wifi

This BRAND NEW charmingly renovated retreat, is fresh and immaculate and will make you feel right at home! It also includes free wifi. We are SUPER HOSTS for the fourth time! With three bedrooms and two bathrooms, this fully self-contained home will cater up to 7 guests- Queen, Double, two single beds and a foldaway single bed (please advise). With ducted reverse heating and cooling throughout, you will certainly feel the comforts of home during your stay. Also 20% discount for weekly stays.'

106060396: Gorgeous apartment! Very flash, with modern appliances (keyless entry, electronic blinds, etc). Lovely, tidy, and very cosy. Fabulous big bed that is super comfy! 113109230:
Yanni’s home was as described in the AirBNB description. It appears newly built and furnished with modern and stylish fittings and linen. The cooling system worked well to keep out the outside heat. The double glazed glass in the doors to the patio helped I’m sure.

The bathroom and kitchen were spacious and immaculately presented. The shower was a pleasure to use. Wifi was good. The bedroom provided for our use although containing a comfortable king sized bed did not provide enough floor space for us to keep our bags and belongings in with us. We had to put them in the lounge room. There appeared to be another bedroom which was locked and not available for our use.
4134118: Very nice place, almost new. Would recommend to others.
88036067:
A short drive to the city - a near new place, well laid out and 5 star.
Way better than any hotel in Griffith.
35696609: Great townhouse situated in a quiet street. Property is brand new and nicely furnished. Would suit anyone looking for a bit more space than a hotel room can really offer.
149887863: Gorgeous appt. Very helpful and good communication. Only place I would stay in Griffith now.
126008946:
We had the perfect stay - 5 nights, right behind Ted Scobie Oval, where my son played soccer for the week as Yanni said, "You can see the fields from the lounge" - I was sold! There is a basketball hoop just off your back door, a park across the road and supermarket 2mins away - perfect location 10/10. 

Front he moment we opened the front door we we're extremely impressed! The property was modern (exactly as the pictures), super clean, fresh, stylish, roomy and with all the comforts of home and more. It comes well equipped with ducted aircon, heater, dishwasher, washer/dryer, plates and cutlery etc, basic tea/coffee and sugar is in hand - but the shower is definitely worth a mention and the soft sheridan towels is a nice touch - 5* star comfort!

Was pleasantly surprised the wi-fi was super fast and reliable which was awesome as I was also working remotely.

And finally to our host Yanni, a special thanks, he's a pleasure to deal with - great communication, very responsive to messages/calls and was only too happy to assist 10/10. Seamless booking process, easy check in/out process can't fault anything. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and I highly recommended this property - I know for sure I'll be back when next in Griffith. Thanks again Yanni!
34484838: Super clean, spacious, comfortable and stylish. Amazing shower with fluffy white Sheridan towels. We had a lovely peaceful relaxing stay for 2 nights. Beds were modern and comfortable, a good nights sleep. Heartily recommend. Thank you Yanni.

49571507:
A lovely home to stay in, extremely clean with lots of personal touches such as a dishwasher, shampoo/conditioner and body wash in the bathroom and good air con/heating. 

The home is well decorated and makes you feel like you're really at a home away from home. 

We highly recommend this place when staying in Griffith, it's value for money.
11430222: Fantastic little cottage with extra touches that made our stay so comfortable.  A bottle of sparkling wine was in the fridge chilled which was much appreciated!  Coffee pods, magazines, local brochures and tips all ensured we were 3 extremely happy airbnbers! Thanks Anne-Maree.
109296275: BEYOND BEAUTIFUL! the house was so tidy and homey! Spent a week and felt like home. Beautiful yard to relax in and close to Main Street! would definitely recommend!
2696998:
This is a lovely and stylish cottage, with lots of thoughtful touches and obvious TLC. It was spotlessly clean. Anne-Maree (the host, not local) was courteous, considerate and prompt to respond. I had some special needs queries and she did her best to accommodate them. There were very helpful welcoming notes and local information, and it was a very enjoyable space to relax in (I stayed for nine nights). 

The (single) bed I slept in was comfortable, the shower was fantastic and I really appreciated the skylight in the (spacious) bathroom. Nice big TV, with plenty of DVDs and CDs available. I would have loved to have spent more time on the back deck if not for the extreme heatwave (a string of 45 degree days, which, by the way, the air conditioning handled like a breeze). 

The kitchen is basic, however, with lots of conveniences. The saucepans could use an upgrade so if cooking is a big thing for you, it's something to keep in mind. Some of the kitchen stuff is stored in a cupboard in the laundry so best keep an eye out for that.

The fragranced laundry detergent used for the linen and bedding would most likely not suit asthmatics and those with chemical sensitivities/allergies, however, that's an easy thing to fix so could easily change in future. Best to check first if you have any concerns.

There's a bit of a blindspot when backing out of the carport (across a footpath/cycle path), so best to do so slowly and attentively (or back in instead). There's a bit of traffic noise, however, it's mostly just cars so fairly unobtrusive (unless you are particularly sensitive to that - it's nothing like the full-on traffic noise of a main arterial with trucks and all.) 
The neighbourhood seems fairly quiet, and the location is just a few minutes away from the convenience of the centre of town. All-in-all, a very nice home away from home, and good value for money.
8093076: Ann-Maree's place is highly recommended!  My wife and I were in Griffith to do some research for about a month and we were perfectly comfortable in the house.  If you're in the area and looking for good Italian food, check out Zecca, but call to make a reservation a day or two in advance!!
11211565: WE were in town for a family wedding , the house was just what we needed for the 3 days we were there.  So close to the wedding venue we could actually walk.  we had a great time
4395020: We were in Griffith for a wedding, and Ann-Maree’s place was perfect. Homely and very relaxing, much more enjoyable than a motel - thank you for having us
178544000: An outstanding, beautifully appointed home with an excellent location. A real "home away from home", such great little extra touches. Thank you also for the welcoming bottle of wine. Definitely recommend to our family and friends.
52830260: Beautifully presented home in a great central location, whilst still being nice and quiet. Perfect home away from home

34494762: Beautiful home, great location!! We had the best time! Highly recommended, Ann was great at preparing and even gave us a lovely bottle of champagne!
49979515: Ann-Maree's  place is nice & comfortable, great amenities and within walking distance to a nearby park with bbq facilities. This was our first time to Griffith and we visited some wineries & explored the town & surrounding area.
32224083: The house is clean and well appointed, with a complimentary bottle of bubbly! Loads of local info available and the house is fully airconditioned. Highly recommend this house for a stay when visiting Griffith.

18618323: Ann-Maree’s place was cosy, comfortable and very clean. A great place to relax at home, and to stroll out to nearby wineries or into town. We were very warm of a night with the gas heater, and enjoyed sitting out in the backyard, soaking up the sun!
